messages.title: Better schools
messages.content: Improving standards and discipline in schools.

messages.title: Giving the NHS back to the people
messages.content: We will make the NHS work for you.

messages.title: How to get Britain Working
messages.content: Conservatives have pledged action right now as well as hope for the future.

messages.title: More support for parents
messages.content: Conservatives giving power back to parents.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving the NHS back to the people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Actions to make the NHS work for people including cutting bureaucracy and putting power in the hands of patients and doctors.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improving standards and discipline in schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on giving headteachers more powers to maintain discipline, ensuring children are learning in an environment that is conducive to their education.
Empowering parents by giving them access to the best schools for their children and information on how schools are performing.
A plan to tackle unemployment and get people back into work, encompassing a range of measures from helping businesses to increasing job opportunities.

issues.economy: A plan to tackle unemployment and get people back into work, encompassing a range of measures from helping businesses to increasing job opportunities.
